amendment.description: Amendment temporarily prohibits the Department of Defense from allowing certain security clearances that have requested renewal to expire.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 109-459 to prevent DoD from revoking expired security clearances from defense contractors until an investigation moratorium and backlog is eliminated; and does not change the security clearance investigation process or prevent the department from revoking security clearances for national security purposes.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Simmons amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
